definition: 10th earthly branch: 5-7 p.m., 8th solar month (8th September-7th October), year of the Rooster/ancient Chinese compass point: 270° (west)
the sound of the wind/to soar

sentences.english: Drain the cooked manioc, return to the pan and mash with a potato masher or fork.
sentences.chinese: 排水熟木薯，返回泛醪和一個馬鈴薯烤至或叉子。

sentences.english: The American ginseng additive microparticlesproduced after dissolution can be discharged when the wort is filtered.
sentences.chinese: 溶解後的花旗參添加料微粒在醪液過濾時一起排掉。

sentences.english: Whiskey( or whisky ):Any of several distilled liquors made from a fermented mash of cereal grains.
sentences.chinese: 威士忌任何由各種穀物的糖化醪發酵後製得的蒸餾酒。

sentences.english: Oxygen bomb calorimeter was used to determine calorific value of vinasse.
sentences.chinese: 用氧彈直接測定糖廠廢醪液的發熱量。

sentences.english: Resin method is adopted to extract edible pigment from waste undecanted wine.
sentences.chinese: 採用樹脂法從酒精廢醪中提取食用色素。

definition: to pour wine/to drink wine/to deliberate/to consider
